text: Éder Gustavo Pagoto (born 10 May 1973) is a Brazilian equestrian. He competed in the team eventing at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Brazil Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Pirassununga
title: Éder Gustavo Pagoto
